blocks.name: sa-abvi
blocks.content: A theorem about the universal class. Inference associated with ~ bj-abv (which is proved from fewer axioms). (Contributed by Stefan Allan, 9-Dec-2008.)

blocks.name: xfree
blocks.content: A partial converse to ~ 19.9t . (Contributed by Stefan Allan, 21-Dec-2008.) (Revised by Mario Carneiro, 11-Dec-2016.)

blocks.name: xfree2
blocks.content: A partial converse to ~ 19.9t . (Contributed by Stefan Allan, 21-Dec-2008.)

blocks.name: addltmulALT
blocks.content: A proof readability experiment for ~ addltmul . (Contributed by Stefan Allan, 30-Oct-2010.) (New usage is discouraged.) (Proof modification is discouraged.)
blocks.origin:
thm addltmulALT(class c0, class c1) {
  |- wi(wa(wa(wcel(c0, cr), wcel(c1, cr)), wa(wbr(nat2, clt, c0), wbr(nat2, clt, c1))), wbr(co(c0, caddc, c1), clt, co(c0, cmul, c1)))
} = {
  mpd(wa(wa(wcel(c0, cr), wcel(c1, cr)), wa(wbr(nat2, clt, c0), wbr(nat2, clt, c1))), wbr(co(c0, caddc, c1), clt, co(c0, cmul, c1)), wa(wbr(nat1, clt, co(c0, cmin, nat1)), wbr(nat1, clt, co(c1, cmin, nat1))))
  an4s(wcel(c0, cr), wcel(c1, cr), wbr(nat2, clt, c0), wbr(nat2, clt, c1), wa(wbr(nat1, clt, co(c0, cmin, nat1)), wbr(nat1, clt, co(c1, cmin, nat1))))
  anim12i(wa(wcel(c0, cr), wbr(nat2, clt, c0)), wa(wcel(c1, cr), wbr(nat2, clt, c1)), wbr(nat1, clt, co(c0, cmin, nat1)), wbr(nat1, clt, co(c1, cmin, nat1)))
  mpbid(wa(wcel(c0, cr), wbr(nat2, clt, c0)), wbr(nat1, clt, co(c0, cmin, nat1)), wbr(nat2, clt, c0))
  simpr(wcel(c0, cr), wbr(nat2, clt, c0))
  bitrd(wa(wcel(c0, cr), wbr(nat2, clt, c0)), wbr(nat2, clt, c0), wbr(nat1, clt, co(c0, cmin, nat1)), wbr(co(nat2, cmin, nat1), clt, co(c0, cmin, nat1)))
  syl3anc(wa(wcel(c0, cr), wbr(nat2, clt, c0)), wb(wbr(nat2, clt, c0), wbr(co(nat2, cmin, nat1), clt, co(c0, cmin, nat1))), wcel(nat2, cr), wcel(c0, cr), wcel(nat1, cr))
  a1i(wa(wcel(c0, cr), wbr(nat2, clt, c0)), wcel(nat2, cr))
  simpl(wcel(c0, cr), wbr(nat2, clt, c0))
  a1i(wa(wcel(c0, cr), wbr(nat2, clt, c0)), wcel(nat1, cr))
  ltsub1(nat2, c0, nat1)
  a1i(wa(wcel(c0, cr), wbr(nat2, clt, c0)), wb(wbr(co(nat2, cmin, nat1), clt, co(c0, cmin, nat1)), wbr(nat1, clt, co(c0, cmin, nat1))))
  breq1i(co(nat2, cmin, nat1), clt, co(c0, cmin, nat1), nat1)
  mpbid(wa(wcel(c1, cr), wbr(nat2, clt, c1)), wbr(nat1, clt, co(c1, cmin, nat1)), wbr(nat2, clt, c1))
  simpr(wcel(c1, cr), wbr(nat2, clt, c1))
  bitrd(wa(wcel(c1, cr), wbr(nat2, clt, c1)), wbr(nat2, clt, c1), wbr(nat1, clt, co(c1, cmin, nat1)), wbr(co(nat2, cmin, nat1), clt, co(c1, cmin, nat1)))
  syl3anc(wa(wcel(c1, cr), wbr(nat2, clt, c1)), wb(wbr(nat2, clt, c1), wbr(co(nat2, cmin, nat1), clt, co(c1, cmin, nat1))), wcel(nat2, cr), wcel(c1, cr), wcel(nat1, cr))
  a1i(wa(wcel(c1, cr), wbr(nat2, clt, c1)), wcel(nat2, cr))
  2re()
  simpl(wcel(c1, cr), wbr(nat2, clt, c1))
  a1i(wa(wcel(c1, cr), wbr(nat2, clt, c1)), wcel(nat1, cr))
  ltsub1(nat2, c1, nat1)
  a1i(wa(wcel(c1, cr), wbr(nat2, clt, c1)), wb(wbr(co(nat2, cmin, nat1), clt, co(c1, cmin, nat1)), wbr(nat1, clt, co(c1, cmin, nat1))))
  breq1i(co(nat2, cmin, nat1), clt, co(c1, cmin, nat1), nat1)
  subaddrii(nat2, nat1, nat1)
  2cn()
  eqcomi(co(nat1, caddc, nat1), nat2)
  df-2()
  3syld(wa(wa(wcel(c0, cr), wcel(c1, cr)), wa(wbr(nat2, clt, c0), wbr(nat2, clt, c1))), wa(wbr(nat1, clt, co(c0, cmin, nat1)), wbr(nat1, clt, co(c1, cmin, nat1))), wbr(co(c0, caddc, c1), clt, co(c0, cmul, c1)), wbr(nat1, clt, co(co(c0, cmin, nat1), cmul, co(c1, cmin, nat1))), wbr(nat1, clt, co(co(co(c0, cmul, c1), caddc, co(nat1, cmul, nat1)), cmin, co(co(c0, cmul, nat1), caddc, co(c1, cmul, nat1)))))
  adantr(wa(wcel(c0, cr), wcel(c1, cr)), wa(wbr(nat2, clt, c0), wbr(nat2, clt, c1)), wi(wa(wbr(nat1, clt, co(c0, cmin, nat1)), wbr(nat1, clt, co(c1, cmin, nat1))), wbr(nat1, clt, co(co(c0, cmin, nat1), cmul, co(c1, cmin, nat1)))))

  anim1i(wa(wcel(c0, cr), wcel(c1, cr)), wa(wbr(nat1, clt, co(c0, cmin, nat1)), wbr(nat1, clt, co(c1, cmin, nat1))), wa(wcel(co(c0, cmin, nat1), cr), wcel(co(c1, cmin, nat1), cr)))
  anim12i(wcel(c0, cr), wcel(c1, cr), wcel(co(c0, cmin, nat1), cr), wcel(co(c1, cmin, nat1), cr))
  peano2rem(c0)
  peano2rem(c1)
  mulgt1(co(c0, cmin, nat1), co(c1, cmin, nat1))
  adantr(wa(wcel(c0, cr), wcel(c1, cr)), wa(wbr(nat2, clt, c0), wbr(nat2, clt, c1)), wi(wbr(nat1, clt, co(co(c0, cmin, nat1), cmul, co(c1, cmin, nat1))), wbr(nat1, clt, co(co(co(c0, cmul, c1), caddc, co(nat1, cmul, nat1)), cmin, co(co(c0, cmul, nat1), caddc, co(c1, cmul, nat1))))))
  biimpd(wa(wcel(c0, cr), wcel(c1, cr)), wbr(nat1, clt, co(co(c0, cmin, nat1), cmul, co(c1, cmin, nat1))), wbr(nat1, clt, co(co(co(c0, cmul, c1), caddc, co(nat1, cmul, nat1)), cmin, co(co(c0, cmul, nat1), caddc, co(c1, cmul, nat1)))))
  breq2d(nat1, clt, co(co(c0, cmin, nat1), cmul, co(c1, cmin, nat1)), co(co(co(c0, cmul, c1), caddc, co(nat1, cmul, nat1)), cmin, co(co(c0, cmul, nat1), caddc, co(c1, cmul, nat1))), wa(wcel(c0, cr), wcel(c1, cr)))
  syl(wa(wcel(c0, cr), wcel(c1, cr)), wceq(co(co(c0, cmin, nat1), cmul, co(c1, cmin, nat1)), co(co(co(c0, cmul, c1), caddc, co(nat1, cmul, nat1)), cmin, co(co(c0, cmul, nat1), caddc, co(c1, cmul, nat1)))), wa(wa(wcel(c0, cc), wcel(nat1, cc)), wa(wcel(c1, cc), wcel(nat1, cc))))
  anim12i(wcel(c0, cr), wcel(c1, cr), wa(wcel(c0, cc), wcel(nat1, cc)), wa(wcel(c1, cc), wcel(nat1, cc)))
  jca(wcel(c0, cr), wcel(c0, cc), wcel(nat1, cc))
  a1i(wcel(c0, cr), wcel(nat1, cc))
  jca(wcel(c1, cr), wcel(c1, cc), wcel(nat1, cc))
  a1i(wcel(c1, cr), wcel(nat1, cc))
  mulsub(c0, nat1, c1, nat1)
  adantr(wa(wcel(c0, cr), wcel(c1, cr)), wa(wbr(nat2, clt, c0), wbr(nat2, clt, c1)), wi(wbr(nat1, clt, co(co(co(c0, cmul, c1), caddc, co(nat1, cmul, nat1)), cmin, co(co(c0, cmul, nat1), caddc, co(c1, cmul, nat1)))), wbr(co(c0, caddc, c1), clt, co(c0, cmul, c1))))
  sylbird(wa(wcel(c0, cr), wcel(c1, cr)), wbr(nat1, clt, co(co(co(c0, cmul, c1), caddc, co(nat1, cmul, nat1)), cmin, co(co(c0, cmul, nat1), caddc, co(c1, cmul, nat1)))), wbr(co(c0, caddc, c1), clt, co(c0, cmul, c1)), wbr(nat1, clt, co(co(co(c0, cmul, c1), caddc, nat1), cmin, co(c0, caddc, c1))))
  breq2d(nat1, clt, co(co(co(c0, cmul, c1), caddc, nat1), cmin, co(c0, caddc, c1)), co(co(co(c0, cmul, c1), caddc, co(nat1, cmul, nat1)), cmin, co(co(c0, cmul, nat1), caddc, co(c1, cmul, nat1))), wa(wcel(c0, cr), wcel(c1, cr)))
  oveq12d(co(co(c0, cmul, c1), caddc, nat1), cmin, co(c0, caddc, c1), co(co(c0, cmul, c1), caddc, co(nat1, cmul, nat1)), co(co(c0, cmul, nat1), caddc, co(c1, cmul, nat1)), wa(wcel(c0, cr), wcel(c1, cr)))
  oveq2d(co(c0, cmul, c1), caddc, nat1, co(nat1, cmul, nat1), wa(wcel(c0, cr), wcel(c1, cr)))
  mp1i(wa(wcel(c0, cr), wcel(c1, cr)), wceq(nat1, co(nat1, cmul, nat1)), wceq(co(nat1, cmul, nat1), nat1))
  mulid2i(nat1)
  ax-1cn()
  biimpi(wceq(co(nat1, cmul, nat1), nat1), wceq(nat1, co(nat1, cmul, nat1)))
  eqcom(co(nat1, cmul, nat1), nat1)
  oveq12d(c0, caddc, c1, co(c0, cmul, nat1), co(c1, cmul, nat1), wa(wcel(c0, cr), wcel(c1, cr)))
  adantr(wcel(c0, cr), wcel(c1, cr), wceq(c0, co(c0, cmul, nat1)))
  syl(wcel(c0, cr), wceq(c0, co(c0, cmul, nat1)), wcel(c0, cc))
  recn(c0)
  syl(wcel(c0, cc), wceq(c0, co(c0, cmul, nat1)), wceq(co(c0, cmul, nat1), c0))
  mulid1(c0)
  biimpi(wceq(co(c0, cmul, nat1), c0), wceq(c0, co(c0, cmul, nat1)))
  eqcom(co(c0, cmul, nat1), c0)
  adantl(wcel(c0, cr), wcel(c1, cr), wceq(c1, co(c1, cmul, nat1)))
  syl(wcel(c1, cr), wceq(c1, co(c1, cmul, nat1)), wceq(co(c1, cmul, nat1), c1))
  syl(wcel(c1, cr), wceq(co(c1, cmul, nat1), c1), wcel(c1, cc))
  recn(c1)
  mulid1(c1)
  biimpi(wceq(co(c1, cmul, nat1), c1), wceq(c1, co(c1, cmul, nat1)))
  eqcom(co(c1, cmul, nat1), c1)
  sylbird(wa(wcel(c0, cr), wcel(c1, cr)), wbr(nat1, clt, co(co(co(c0, cmul, c1), caddc, nat1), cmin, co(c0, caddc, c1))), wbr(co(c0, caddc, c1), clt, co(c0, cmul, c1)), wbr(co(co(c0, caddc, c1), caddc, nat1), clt, co(co(c0, cmul, c1), caddc, nat1)))
  syl3anc(wa(wcel(c0, cr), wcel(c1, cr)), wb(wbr(co(co(c0, caddc, c1), caddc, nat1), clt, co(co(c0, cmul, c1), caddc, nat1)), wbr(nat1, clt, co(co(co(c0, cmul, c1), caddc, nat1), cmin, co(c0, caddc, c1)))), wcel(co(c0, caddc, c1), cr), wcel(nat1, cr), wcel(co(co(c0, cmul, c1), caddc, nat1), cr))
  syl2anc(wa(wcel(c0, cr), wcel(c1, cr)), wcel(co(co(c0, cmul, c1), caddc, nat1), cr), wcel(co(c0, cmul, c1), cr), wcel(nat1, cr))
  readdcl(co(c0, cmul, c1), nat1)
  ltaddsub2(co(c0, caddc, c1), nat1, co(co(c0, cmul, c1), caddc, nat1))
  biimpd(wa(wcel(c0, cr), wcel(c1, cr)), wbr(co(co(c0, caddc, c1), caddc, nat1), clt, co(co(c0, cmul, c1), caddc, nat1)), wbr(co(c0, caddc, c1), clt, co(c0, cmul, c1)))
  bicomd(wa(wcel(c0, cr), wcel(c1, cr)), wbr(co(co(c0, caddc, c1), caddc, nat1), clt, co(co(c0, cmul, c1), caddc, nat1)), wbr(co(c0, caddc, c1), clt, co(c0, cmul, c1)))

  remulcl(c0, c1)
  a1i(wa(wcel(c0, cr), wcel(c1, cr)), wcel(nat1, cr))
  1re()
  ltadd1(co(c0, caddc, c1), co(c0, cmul, c1), nat1)
}
